  • Classes in ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling used by ComparativeGenomics.Drawing
    Class
    Description
    CmapData
    Stores the data corresponding to each cmap ID within a CMAP file.
    Gene
    Stores the gene entries from a GTF or GFFF file via the Annot object.
    XmapData
    Stores the data for each individual alignment identified as the XMAP file.
  • Classes in ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling used by ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling
    Class
    Description
    CmapData
    Stores the data corresponding to each cmap ID within a CMAP file.
    Gene
    Stores the gene entries from a GTF or GFFF file via the Annot object.
    Sequence
    Contains a nucleotide sequence and calculates useful statistics such as number of Ns and GC content
    SVFandom
    Saves all the information contained in the file SV.txt, output of FaNDOM alignments in which SV information are saved.
    SVRefAligner
    Saves all the information contained in the file SMAP, output from runBNG SV, that contains data about SVs detected during the alignment.
    XmapData
    Stores the data for each individual alignment identified as the XMAP file.
  • Classes in ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling used by ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling
    Class
    Description
    Chromosome
    Combines the CmapData, XmapData, annotations (gene), structural variants and context of the chromosome within a genom
    CmapData
    Stores the data corresponding to each cmap ID within a CMAP file.
    Gene
    Stores the gene entries from a GTF or GFFF file via the Annot object.
    Genome
    Stores all the metadata for example species of the genome, amd group the files related to the genome.
    Match
    Stores the information on the match, so that only the matches related to the displayed reference cmap are drawn.
    Pair
    Stores the aligned site id's of the reference and query cmaps.
    Sequence
    Contains a nucleotide sequence and calculates useful statistics such as number of Ns and GC content
    Site
    Store the information of a digestion site on a cmap contig Any match event associated with this site is stored in a HashMap The key is the xmap id, the value is an ArrayList of match objects
    XmapData
    Stores the data for each individual alignment identified as the XMAP file.
